General.Name: Nuvotec
General.Description: Nuvotec Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells piping materials in South Korea. The company offers PVC and HDPE double wall pipes, high rigid PVC double wall pipes, sewer and manhole products, and rain stations. Nuvotec Co. Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is based in Wonju, South Korea.
General.Address: 42-6 Taejang Industrial Complex-gil, Wonju, South Korea
